comment: Dr. Davis is extremely helpful, she would bend over backwards to try and help you succeed. She is not a tough grader but the class is a lot of work. Will definitely make you a better writer with the most thorough comments I have ever seen, and opportunities to revise papers using them. Take her, just don't expect it to be easy based on her rating.

I love Dr. Davis.  One of the nicest professors I've ever had and she's very knowledgeable.  Class was discussion based and everyone had a chance to participate.  Not too tough of a grader.  Reading workload is extremely heavy so be aware; at least it's normally very interesting.  No expensive textbooks, just several paperbacks.

Dr. Davis is wonderful! One of the nicest professors I've met. You can tell she's interested in  the subject matter, and she always makes class interesting. If you pay attention and give it your best effort, you'll do fine.
I loved Dr. Davis, she is a wonderful teacher. She teaches from novels and not a textbook. She is sweet and personable, the days in class were never boring.
Dr. Davis is the best professor I have ever had. She is helpful, compassionate, and very, very intelligent. Take her if you can!
Best Prof. there is.  Too bad other prof are not like her.  Very passionate teacher, helpful, and overall hosts a great classroom experience.
She is the best teacher I've had so far at KSU. Clear, helpful, and kind, she makes the best professor. I would definitely recommend her to others.
Dr. Davis is one of the most awesome women at KSU. Always helpful, polite, courteous and fair I very much enjoy working with her both through the Honors program and as one of her students.
Super wonderful professor! She really tries to help you to do your best. I really enjoyed her class and felt it was really easy.

Dr. Davis is a wonderful, engaging teacher. She really wants her students to succeed and if you show her that you are working hard, she will do whatever she can to help you along. I never would have made it through college without her.
Very good teacher although she is pretty tough.  She helps you to develop good writing skills.  You take a lot of quizes and write about 5 essays.
